DOC.brief_summary: Randomized, open-label, phase III study to evaluate the efficacy of rituximab maintenance therapy in patients aged between 18 and 65 years inclusive undergoing first-line treatment for mantle cell lymphoma and exhibiting a response after autologous transplantation.
DOC.brief_title: Mantel Cell Lymphoma Efficacy of Rituximab Maintenance
DOC.detailed_description: Demonstration of the superiority in terms of 4-year event-free survival (EFS) of Rituximab maintenance therapy compared to post-autograft surveillance in patients aged 18-65 years inclusive, treated with R-DHAP then autologous transplantation for MCL as first-line therapy.
DOC.criteria: mantle cell lymphoma Initial immunophenotyping with CD20 and CD5. CD20+. t (11;14) by karyote, FISH, molecular biology or immunohistochemistry (Bcl1) Patient no previous treated. At least one tumor site accessible for assessment Aged > 18 years < 65 ECOG < or = 2. No other neoplasms apart from resected basal cell carcinoma or in situ carcinoma. signed informed consent FEVG 50% other type of lymphoma ECOG > or = 3 relapse serology VIH + Hepatite + diabetis
